predicate.note: Frames file for 'transmogrify' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: the one example
example.text: When reduced to buzzword status in ex parte pledges, however, the notion transmogrified into a promised assault, with targets primarily for political gains, not justice.
example.arg: When reduced to buzzword status in ex parte pledges
with targets primarily for political gains, not justice
